column6: Wolverine may be the best there is on earth but will that hold true when Bounty Hunters Monark Starstalker and Paradox take him on a trip through the vastness of Space? What's all this talk of spaceborn technecrotic viruss that produce a race of unkillable zombies? And just how long can Logan hold his breath in a total vacuum while cutting alien invaders to ribbons? The answers will shock you! Don't miss WOLVERINE: THE BEST THERE IS #9, coming your way at light speed.
column8: | Penciller:Bryan Hitch | Writer:WRITERS HOUSE LLC | Colorist:Andres Mossa | Inker:JUAN JOSE RODRIGUEZ PRIETO | Letterer:Richard Starkings
